name: Seek Not a Lighthouse
description: After they stopped receiving communications from the creature below, all hope was lost, with the final message warning the islanders to be aware of what, or who, was to come...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Duo Core 1.8Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: At least 512mb of VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible sound card
